channel.title: [718/752] Echo - The Sequel to the Beginning!
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UF8n7NR.png[/img]
[img]http://cdn2.iconfinder.com/data/icons/ledicons/link.png[/img][URL=http://"http://rune-force.org"]Website[/URL]| [IMG]http://cdn4.iconfinder.com/data/icons/Hypic_Icon_Pack_by_shlyapnikova/16/forum_16.png[/img][URL=http://"http://rune-force.org/index.php?/index"]Forums[/URL] | [IMG]http://cdn2.iconfinder.com/data/icons/splashyIcons/download.png[/img][URL=http://"http://rune-force.org/index.php?/forum/3-download-718-client/"]Download Client[/URL] | [IMG]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/silk2/control_play.png[/img][URL=http://"http://rune-force.org/#"]Play Webclient[/URL]
Echo 718/752, always giving you the latest RuneScape updates & features!
This server has been rocky ever since 2011, but we have finally stabilized ourselves, and are more ready than ever to churn out the best content, and strive to be one of the top private servers again.
This information is irrelevant, and I'm sure you're interested in seeing what we have to offer!
Our features include everything from:
Tormented Demons Frost Dragons Fight Pits Fight Caves Fight Kiln Godwars Nex Bandos Armadyl Saradomin Zamorak Clan Wars Dominion Tower Warriors Guild Castle Wars Barrows Kalphite Queen Corporeal Beast King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Mage Bank Multi Area Wests Easts Slayer Dungeons Slayer Tower Revenants Cave Most skills
(This list is the typical 'leeched' matrix source content, but we're working towards custom content. Do not be discouraged!)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YpPlU6I.png[/img] [img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/7555/d88767c032a540c3841d258.png[/img] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/2281/edea13bcb124433aa799dda.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RKQEz92.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hbYIerE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TLfYfcH.png[/img] [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/8529/f2e9a0cd89884877848b8dd.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/9619/7bbb10731681478d96104fc.png[/img] [/CENTER]
